description: This Java class defines a REST controller for handling user authentication functions such as signup, login, current user info, and logout. It utilizes Spring Boot and Spring Security for session-based authentication.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: REST controller for user authentication endpoints including signup, login, fetching current user info, and logout.

classes.name: SignupRequest
classes.description: Data transfer object for user signup containing email and password.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: Data transfer object for user login containing email and password.

classes.name: MeResponse
classes.description: Data transfer object for returning user id and email of the authenticated user.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Handles user registration. Checks for existing email, encodes password, saves user, and returns user info.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates user with provided email and password, sets session, and returns user info.

methods.name: me
methods.description: Returns current authenticated user's ID and email, or 401 if not authenticated.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out current user and invalidates session.
